name: Dental Implant
description: Find what you are looking for! 99% Match on Dental Implants Dubai. Find Here - Free, Private and Secure. Results & Answers.

name: Dental Bridges
description: If you have one or more missing teeth, a dental bridge can fill the gap with one or more artificial (false) teeth. A bridge is typically made of crowns on either side of the missing tooth or teeth supporting the pontic (false tooth) and is cemented in place.

name: Root Canel
description: Root canal treatment (endodontics) is a dental procedure used to treat infection at the centre of a tooth. Root canal treatment is not painful and can save a tooth that might otherwise have to be removed completely.
